title: 📢【112學年度畢業典禮】雨天備案[Graduation Ceremony of the 112th Academic Year] Alternative plan of rainy day
department: 學務處畢業生及校友服務組
author: 溫小姐
content:
分類： 活動公告, 其他公告
來源： 學務處畢業生及校友服務組 - 溫小姐 - fengting0804@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6282
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 📢【112學年度畢業典禮】雨天備案[Graduation Ceremony of the 112th Academic Year] Alternative plan of rainy day
日期： Fri, 31 May 2024 19:16:16 +0800

全校師生及家長大家好：
   
  6/1畢業典禮若遇大雨，本校將於當日下午2點發布校園公告信週知，並於各大樓廣播。請自行前往體育館，參加畢業典禮。

   學務處祝福大家事事如意，畢業生👨‍🎓👩‍🎓一帆風順，鵬程萬里。～

Dear All,
  In the event of heavy rain on the day of the graduation ceremony (6/1), the school will send out a campus announcement via email and broadcast it at 2 p.m. on July 1. If this happens, please proceed directly to the gymnasium on your own.

  The Office of Student Affairs sends best wishes to everyone, and hopes that the graduates will have a smooth sailing and a bright future.

Thank you.
